description: Meet your new favorite throw-it-on-top of anything shirt jacket—the Men's Ridgefield Sherpa-Lined Flannel Jacket is the perfect cold-weather companion for everything from early-morning snow shoveling and late-night campfire hangs to leisurely coffee shop excursions and slopeside bar crawls. The heavy polyester exterior and sherpa lining is as cozy as a wood-burning fireplace, and it will keep you just as warm from the late summer bloom until there’s no leaves left on the trees.
name: Ridgefield Sherpa Flannel Shirt Jacket - Mens
